name: CD1212
description:
In CD1212 you must complete daily tasks to provide for your family and each day you sacrifice everything for them.

AUDIO REQUIRED FOR DIALOGUE

Controls:

WASD or Left Stick on a Gamepad to MOVE

Mouse or Right Stick on a Gamepad to LOOK

Left Mouse Click or X on a Gamepad to INTERACT

Right Mouse Click or A on a Gamepad to CROUCH
